message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I really appreciate it, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $85. What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, $85 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counter with $110. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $110 is still a bit out of my budget. How about we settle on $95? That's a fair price for both of us.
I'm not quite ready to give up yet, Bob. $95 is still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to make one more compromise, so I'll meet you at $105. That's as low as I'm willing to go.
